goal.en: Introduce the basic knowledge of econometrics and related statistical analysis methods.
goal.ch: 介紹計量經濟學的基礎知識及相關的統計分析方法。

content.en:
1. Introduction to Derivatives <\br>
2. Introduction to Forwards and Options <\br>
3. Trading Strategies Involving Options <\br>
4. High-Frequency Data Analysis and Market Microstructure <\br>
5. Extreme Values, Quantiles, and Value-at-Risk <\br>
6. Multivariate Time Series and Its Applications <\br>
7. Principal Component Analysis and Factor Models
